pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modify and Share Images // Tools for manipulating, visualizing, and exporting raster images in R. Designed as an educational resource for students learning the basics of remote sensing, the package provides user-friendly functions to apply color ramps, export RGB composites, and create multi-frame visualizations. Built on top of the 'terra' and 'ggplot2' packages. See https://github.com/ducciorocchini/imageRy for more details and examples.
